channel.title: David Carradine found dead in Bangkok
channel.description:
Hanged himself..
I doubt many people care about another death. But I'm making a topic because I am a huge fan of him and his death saddened me.
He truly is a great actor. This is one of my favorite clips. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lASM_n2R_TY
News story: http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20090604/ap_on_re_as/as_obit_carradine;_ylt=AvhhZohv_fWkdq5.oKtuM950fNdF
